name: タップ De ぷる萌え！ みのりちゃん
summary:
ボーイフレンドのお願いで、無理矢理Ｈな
ＳＭの格好をさせられた「みのり」
--
Because of the request of lover,MINORI was forced to wear naughty SM costumes.
Because of the request of lover,MINORI
was forced to wear naughty SM costumes.

Although reluctant at first, as the body is
touched,she has been increasingly
obsessed with...

With one tap she trembles and she moans softly.
If you miss…
You can also use your finger to make her do as you wish.

Extra stage included
Please mind the sound.
Android 2.2 or later.
Requires Adobe AIR.
